author: henning
msg: facade methods for getUserList(), setUserManager(), getUserManager()

author: henning
msg: remove caching from getAllGroups() / getAllRoles() / getAllPermissions()
While the basic idea was nice, the problem is that these caches get stale
once you start adding groups/roles/permissions to the security provider.
There was no way to invalidate these caches from the outside.
